ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(RW_Registration_Status__c , "Registration Completed"), ISCHANGED( RW_Registration_Date__c ), Project__r.Name == '7 Mahalaxmi', /*Added by Vinay 21-05-2025*/ $User.LastName != 'SAP' /*Added by Vinay 22-05-2025*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Registration details can not be changed after Registration Completed
